subject: Re: [junit] [Q] Using "golden files" with JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi Joe, Thanks for the response. This sounds silly, but I have not been able to find one anywhere. Do yo mind sending me the URL where I can download this
messageBody:
Hi Joe,

Thanks for the response.

This sounds silly, but I have not been able to find
one
anywhere. Do yo mind sending me the URL where I can
download
this addon from ?

Regards

- Soumendra Daaas

Would appreciatte your help on this.
>
